projects.heading: Co-Founder at Unnamed Engineering
projects.description: A global product studio made up of four teenage developers, united by a passion for creating tools and products that make developers' everyday tasks more fun, efficient, and productive.
projects.title: Co-Founder

awards.heading: Launch Week 8 Hackathon - Most Technically Impressive from Supabase
awards.description: Openbin is a Pastebin-inspired tool designed for command line enthusiasts, offering both a fast, user-friendly web editor and a streamlined CLI for maximum efficiency. We crafted the core Openbin platform in just 8 days, with 215+ commits, bringing it from concept to reality.
awards.title: Launch Week 8 Hackathon - Most Technically Impressive

workExperience.heading: Founder & Product Lead at Lapse
workExperience.description: Store your images using a comprehensive array of advanced image processing capabilities.
workExperience.title: Founder & Product Lead

workExperience.heading: Customer Support Lead at Metrik
workExperience.description: Automated operations toolkit for Roblox game developers.
workExperience.title: Customer Support Lead

workExperience.heading: Community at circle labs (now Shapes, Inc.)
workExperience.description: A platform that allows everyone to create their own AI-powered virtual characters. Over 200,000 community members.
workExperience.title: Community
